page.title: 12EVENTS LINK FAIR
page.content: Every year in May we have a fair on the Maslvern Link Common. It is run by S.Matthias' Church. The money that is raised goes to the church.This year it raised Â£1000. There are lots of amusements such as pony rides, Maypole dancing,refreshments,games, cake stall,S.Matthias' Pligrims' Jazz Band,Tombola, Nearly New Clothes,and toys. There is a May Queen and Boy Bishop and a Forget-me-not Queen who is the Mayqueen from the previous year. This school, Malvern Link C.E. School provided the Maypole dancing. We danced the single plait, double plait, Barber's pole and Spider's Web. The pole is made from a hop pole. It is about four metres tall.
